name: Rumi's Bakeshop
description:
COME INSIDE RUMI'S BAKESHOP! WE'RE OPEN!

Business is booming and it's up to you to keep it that way! With your magical slime powers, poof those cakes away to the hungry customers. Just make sure to not give them the wrong cake... or give out a cancelled order... or make them wait too long... well, good luck!


CREATED BYJarl SarmientoGame DeveloperMesai MemoriaGame Designer and Artist ASSETS FROMilhamtaroCake Illustrations
